titles.title: Keppeki Danshi! Aoyama-kun
Cleanliness Boy! Aoyama-kun
결벽남자! 아오야마군
潔癖男子! 青山くん
Clean Freak! Aoyama-kun
洁癖男子！青山君

anime.description: * Based on on a seinen manga series written and illustrated by http://anidb.net/cr48673 [Sakamoto Taku]. http://anidb.net/ch89594 [Aoyama] is a handsome young soccer genius who is a Japan representative. His play style is cleanliness. He doesn`t tackle and doesn`t head the ball. If he`s doing a throw-in, he`ll only do it if he`s wearing gloves. Source: ANN

tag.name: association football
tag.description: Football is a sport that involves kicking a ball in order to score a goal, while the other team tries to stop you by kicking the ball in the other direction to score a goal of their own. In the United States, this sport is known as soccer; the inappropriately titled "American" football (which in fact is played with the egg-shaped "ball" being carried around) is some kind of rugby for babies.

tag.name: seinen
tag.description: Seinen, literally "young man", is one of the main demographic classifications applied to manga, and, by extension, to anime, especially manga-based ones. As the name implies, seinen works are marketed primarily to an audience of young men; the age range commonly understood to be the target of such works goes roughly from 17 to somewhere in the 40s.

tag.name: target audience
tag.description: Anime, like everything else in the modern world, is targeted towards specific audiences, both implicitly by the creators and overtly by the marketing. While categories are associated with specific sex and age groups, this is not a bar on the anime being enjoyed by people who don`t fit into that band; not only do crossover titles exist, but the categories also have a considerable following outside their main demographic, and a person might as well enjoy anime from all categories. Still, does not invalidate the usefulness of marking a title as one of the categories; the same themes will likely be treated differently in anime geared for different audiences. Only one should not jump the gun and assume that a title will be more or less serious or present content in this or that way due to its target audience, or conversely assume the target audience on the content and its presentation alone. As such, the audience categories help form a broad impression of how a title might work with the announced themes, but offer little to no in-depth information about specific content or its treatment. The audience categories originate from manga magazines, which group titles of a same intended audience into a magazine that is advertised as belonging to that category, and so manga-based anime will have the category from their parent work. As for anime based on other works, the audience is often debatable, but comparing information such as time slot to the manga-based anime generally helps figure out the most likely possibility. If the parent material was classified under multiple audiences over time (for example, it was originally shounen, but then as the plot changed and became more mature, it was reclassified as seinen), and the anime adapts parent material time periods covering multiple audiences, we tag all audiences covered by the anime adaptation.

tag.name: themes
tag.description: Themes describe the very central elements important to the anime stories. They set the backdrop against which the protagonists must face their challenges. Be it School Life, present Daily Life, Military action, Cyberpunk, Law and Order detective work, Sports, or the Underworld. These are only but a few of the more typical backgrounds for anime plots. Add to that a Conspiracy setting with a possible tragic outcome, the Themes span most of the imaginable subject matter relevant to anime.

tag.name: original work
tag.description: What the anime is based on! This is given as the original work credit in the OP. Mostly of academic interest, but a useful bit of info, hinting at the possible depth of story.

tag.name: elements
tag.description: Next to Themes setting the backdrop for the protagonists in anime, there are the more detailed plot Elements that centre on character interactions: "What do characters do to each other or what is done to them?". Is it violent Action, an awe-inspiring Adventure in a foreign place, the gripping life of a Detective, a slapstick Comedy, an Ecchi Harem anime, a SciFi epic, or some Fantasy travelling adventure?

tag.name: super deformed
tag.description: A caricature style often seen in anime when the character shows extreme emotions, like fear, anger, happiness, surprise, or shame. Seen as cute, as part of humorous comedy. The character`s http://anidb.net/t4055 [face suddenly turns into a simplified version], the body will usually also deform into that of a small child (oversized head, short limbs, extra-large tears).

tag.name: slapstick
tag.description: Slapstick humour is generally recognized by lots of physical abuse, horseplay and practical jokes. Also often seen are impossible situations, using sounds to illustrate impossible stunts that aren`t shown on-screen and to create tension for audience anticipation.

tag.name: manga
tag.description: Manga is the lifeblood that drives the anime industry. Everything and its mother is based on manga. However! There are exceptions where the manga was not the basis for the anime. It`s common practice to make manga adaptations of many popular anime, there`s a manga based on Evangelion, and two (one shounen and one shoujo) based on each of Escaflowne and Mahou Tsukai Tai. Also it`s quite common to release manga and anime versions of a story in parallel, for instance Nadesico and Shoujo Kakumei Utena. There are also cases where an anime continues in a manga, as in the case of Angel Beats! and Angel Beats: Heaven`s Door, or reverse. See also http://anidb.net/t6493 [manhua] and http://anidb.net/t5010 [manhwa].

tag.name: comedy
tag.description: Anime whose central struggle causes hilarious results. These stories are built upon funny characters, situations and events. A comedy anime is laced with humour and sets out to provoke laughter from the audience. Japanese humour can be a bit strange to westerners, so if you`re new to this type of humour, just bear with it; it`ll most likely grow on you if you`re a fan of other kinds of comedy.

tag.name: sports
tag.description: Sports anime revolves around a recreational physical activity or skill. In addition they often adhere to certain genre conventions, the emphasis on training and practice in preparation for competition, characters desire for self improvement, and pursuit of a specific goal.

tag.name: funny expressions
tag.description: The facial expressions of the characters may change so quickly or unexpectedly distort that hilarity will ensue.

tag.name: facial distortion
tag.description: The characters face are exaggerated into a misshape, deformed, and almost warped. Used as comedy element to express extreme mood swings. Differing from "http://anidb.net/t2652 [Super Deformed]", here only the face changes to an extreme degree, not the whole body of the protagonist.

tag.name: running gag
tag.description: (Bit) character(s) play out a short skit several times during the course of the anime. The skit may or may not be exactly the same but does tend to have the same theme throughout.

tag.name: rivalry
tag.description: Quite broadly used term describing a conflict, contest, struggle, or opposition of some sort. Typical examples: The mostly comedic rivalry for the love of a protagonist in a harem anime (love polygon), the more "mindless" battles between wannabe delinquents in a school fighting anime, or the struggle between good & evil in an epic conflict for world domination.

character.name: Aoyama-kun
character.description: Aoyama is a first-year and Fujimi High School`s midfielder and has competed in U-16 matches. He is a http://anidb.net/t6992 [clean freak], causing him to play soccer in a unique style, involving being extremely careful of physical contact with other players and the ball. He also insists on cleaning the club room and soccer balls after school. He is popular and often garners many spectators during club activities, which annoys http://anidb.net/ch89595 [Zaizen]. Aoyama chose Fujimi High for the school`s `uniqueness`, which turned out to be that its toilet has a bidet. Source: Wikipedia

character.name: Zaizen Kaoru
character.description: Zaizen Kaoru is a rich kid who was the playmaker before http://anidb.net/ch89594 [Aoyama]`s arrival. He is the only person who isn`t used to Aoyama`s eccentricities. While not good with his kick, he is good at using his head, literally. Source: Wikipedia

character.name: Gotou Moka
character.description: Gotou Moka is a girl who has a crush on http://anidb.net/ch89594 [Aoyama]. She is good at http://anidb.net/t6975 [lock picking] and has created her own weapon; a baseball bat with nails and cute stickers to protect Aoyama from being dirty. After the soccer club members found out that she has been cleaning the club room, she becomes a manager for the club. Source: Wikipedia

character.name: Sakai Kazuma
character.description: Sakai Kazuma is a no-nonsense defender with leadership qualities who`s often seen with http://anidb.net/ch89598 [Tsukamoto] and http://anidb.net/ch89599 [Yoshioka]. Source: Wikipedia

character.name: Tsukamoto Jin
character.description: Tsukamoto Jin is the right wing player who wears red-framed glasses and known for living up the club`s mood by playing the soccer ball with his butt. In middle school, he was bullied by the soccer club members because of his habit, causing him to grow fear to the club`s http://anidb.net/ch92732 [captain]. Source: Wikipedia

character.name: Yoshioka Taichi
character.description: Yoshioka Taichi is a gentle player who loves to eat. Who always seen together with http://anidb.net/ch89597 [Sakai] and http://anidb.net/ch89598 [Tsukamoto]. Source: Wikipedia

character.name: Ishikawa Gaku
character.description: Ishikawa Gaku is the soccer club captain. The only player on the team with a http://anidb.net/ch90177 [girlfriend], but since his girlfriend is a fan of http://anidb.net/ch89594 [Aoyama], he ended up a member of Aoyama`s fan club. Source: Wikipedia

character.name: Tada Hikaru
character.description: Tada Hikaru is a narcissistic player who views himself as a step above http://anidb.net/ch89594 [Aoyama]. Source: Wikipedia

character.name: Satou Kiyoshi
character.description: Satou Kiyoshi is the wisecracking goalkeeper of the Fujimi High`s soccer team. Source: Wikipedia

character.name: Takei Miwa
character.description: Takei Miwa is the coach of the Fujimi High School`s soccer team. Miwa is good at http://anidb.net/t1004 [judo], but choose to be soccer club`s coach because she`s in love with an anime character who is a soccer club member. She also a fan of http://anidb.net/t2723 [yaoi]. Source: Wikipedia

character.name: Umeya Tsubasa
character.description: Umeya Tsubasa is a http://anidb.net/t1004 [judo] club member who moved to the soccer club after he fell in love with the club`s manager http://anidb.net/ch89596 [Moka]. After learning that Moka`s in love with http://anidb.net/ch89594 [Aoyama], he decided to support her love instead, stating that not every couple will ended up to marriage, and he only need to wait until that time. Source: Wikipedia

character.name: Ozaki Atsumu
character.description: Ozaki Atsumu is a student at Fujimi High, known for his cool and handsome aura. He is actually a popular manga author under pen name Mirai Takada. He loves observing things around him for manga references and is lately annoyed with http://anidb.net/ch89594 [Aoyama]`s. He created an antagonist based on him and ended up gaining popularity for his manga instead. Source: Wikipedia

character.name: Narita Shion
character.description: Narita Shion is one of http://anidb.net/ch89594 [Aoyama]`s classmates who is also a clean freak, but hides it to not draw attention. He likes to play online games, specifically Monstrosity Hunter, because online world is where he does not need to worry about being dirty. He`s plays in the same party with Aoyama in that game. Source: Wikipedia

character.name: Ibuki Seigo
character.description: Ibuki Seigo is one of U16 player along with http://anidb.net/ch89594 [Aoyama] whom football skills have exceeded Aoyama`s that he has contracted with a Spanish football club. He came back to Japan because he misses Japanese food. Source: Wikipedia

character.name: Odagiri Mio
character.description: Odagiri Mio is the school`s idol and a member of the basketball club who has good athletic ability but somehow couldn`t put the ball to the ring before http://anidb.net/ch89594 [Aoyama] told her to put some feelings on it. Mio is currently the only person whom Aoyama can touch. Source: Wikipedia

character.name: Takechi Akira
character.description: Takechi Akira is Oshigami-Minami High`s forward who always insisted http://anidb.net/ch89594 [Aoyama] to join their soccer club instead and looking down at the rest of Fujimi High`s soccer club members. He always shows his abs when talking to Aoyama. Source: Wikipedia

character.name: Tamura Yuri
character.description: Tamura Yuri is http://anidb.net/ch89600 [Gaku]`s girlfriend and one of http://anidb.net/ch89594 [Aoyama]`s fans. Source: Wikipedia

character.name: Kana
character.description: Kana is http://anidb.net/ch92725 [Youji]`s girlfriend who initially tasked to lock http://anidb.net/ch89594 [Aoyama] up in their clubroom to ensure Takada High`s win, but ended up becomes his fan instead. Source: Wikipedia

character.name: Orihara Youji
character.description: Orihara Youji is Takada High soccer club`s captain with yankee hairstyle. It is said that soccer is the only thing he does seriously but, he likes to playing dirty to ensure his win. Source: Wikipedia

character.name: Smart
character.description: Smart is http://anidb.net/ch89606 [Narita Shion]`s avatar in Monstrosity Hunter MMORPG.

character.name: Aoi Sanmyaku
character.description: Aoi Sanmyaku is http://anidb.net/ch89594 [Aoyama]`s avatar in Monstrosity Hunter MMORPG.

character.name: Kurata Kozue
character.description: Kurata Kozue is http://anidb.net/ch90174 [Seigo]`s girlfriend whom Seigo thought is bad at cooking, but in reality she only cooks healthy food for him, resulting in her cooking`s bland taste.

character.name: Jinnai Daisuke
character.description: Jinnai Daisuke is the advisor for the Fujimi High`s judo club.

character.name: Matsu Suguru
character.description: Matsu Suguru is the main character in http://anidb.net/ch89605 [Ozaki Atsumu]`s manga I`m Going to Save This World!.

character.name: Katahira-sensei
character.description: Ms. Katahira is the math teacher at Fujimi High, known for being strict on students not following the rules and regulations. She tore apart http://anidb.net/ch89598 [Tsukamoto]`s copy of I`m Going to Save This World! and attempted to report the stray cats gathering near school that http://anidb.net/ch89596 [Gotou] was feeding. Fortunately or not, her call was interrupted by http://anidb.net/ch89605 [Ozaki].

character.name: Aoki Wizard
character.description: The Blue Wizard is the villain that appeared in http://anidb.net/ch89605 [Ozaki Atsumu]`s manga I`m Going to Save This World!.

character.name: Gryudo
character.description: Gryudo is the character from http://anidb.net/ch89605 [Ozaki Atsumu]`s manga I`m Going to Save This World!.

character.name: Makio
character.description: Makio is main character in Soccer Boyfriend anime, which http://anidb.net/ch89603 [Takei Miwa] is a fan of.

episode.title: 成田くんは秘密にしてる
Narita-kun Keeps It a Secret
Narita et son secret
나리타군은 비밀을 지키고 있어
Narita-kun wa Himitsu ni Shiteru
episode.summary: There is another clean freak in Aoyama-kun`s class, Narita Shion. Every day, he keeps his germaphobia a secret, avoids human contact as much as possible, and plays online games as he can`t get dirty there. One day, in the home economics class, a super high-level cooking contest breaks out between Aoyama-kun and Narita. On top of that, Narita gets accused of stealing a girl`s gym clothes. Will he be able to prove his innocence without revealing his germaphobia?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 青山くんがいない理由
The Reason Aoyama-kun Isn`t Here
Aoyama est introuvable
아오야마군이 없는 이유
Aoyama-kun ga Inai Riyuu
episode.summary: The day before hte match, people from the soccer team are getting food at a family restaurant. Suddenly, Takechi appears and starts an eating costest with Yoshioka. Then, the day of the match vs Takada Academy. The match is about to begin, but Aoyama-kun can`t be found anywhere! Left without a choice, Fujimi High School starts the match without Aoyama-kun. Could this be their biggest challenge in the preliminaries?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 青山くんは覚えてる?
Aoyama-kun, Do You Remember?
Aoyama, tu t’en souviens ?
아오야마군은 기억해?
Aoyama-kun wa Oboeteru?
episode.summary: Since Aoyama-kun joined the soccer club, from one day to another, the dirty club house has become spotless! On top of that, the school uniforms are neatly folded! But it`s not Aoyama-kun`s doing!? Is this the work of a fairy!? Meanwhile, the rumor that Aoyama-kun`s towel smell amazing wildly escalates. "I want to smell it!" "But my pride!" "I need to protect Aoyama-kun!" These thoughts, amongst others, collide! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 青山くんはキレイ好き
Aoyama-kun Is a Clean Freak
Aoyama, le maniaque de la propreté
아오야마군은 청결함을 좋아해
Aoyama-kun wa Kirei Suki
episode.summary: The prodigy U-16 national player Aoyama-kun has come Fujimi High School`s weak soccer team! However, he`s an extreme clean freak! He avoids passes, doesn`t head, and contact plays are completely out. With him on the roster, Fujimi High School is to play against the historically strong Oshigamiminami High School. That`s where Aoyama-kun meets another U-16 national player, the forward Takechi, again. Aoyama-kun has the absolute territory called germaphobia. What will happen in this match? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 梅屋くんは忍耐強い
Umeya-kun Is Very Patient
Umeya est très persévérant
우메야군은 인내가 깊어
Umeya-kun wa Nintaizuyoi
episode.summary: Umeya Tsuba excels in academic as well as athletic pursuits, and has devotedly followed that path. Even as a freshman, he was throwing his senpais around and was the hope of the judo club. All of the sudden he switched to the soccer club and challenges Aoyama-kun to a duel! Umeya is relentless and keeps at it, but his gaze is on the real reason why he joined the soccer club... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 小田切さんはなかなか入らない
Odagiri-san Can`t Get It In
Odagiri a du mal à les rentrer
오다기리양은 좀처럼 들어가지 않아
Odagiri-san wa Nakanaka Hairanai
episode.summary: Odagiri Mio is the school`s idol, a regular on the basketball team as a freshman, and lauded to be the cutest and to have the best figure in the class. However, she is exceptionally bad at shooting! One day during PE, Odagiri sees Aoyama-kun`s elegant shots and starts to call him "master". Can Odagiri actually land a shot?! And then, the relationship between Aoyama-kun and Odagiri becomes the talk of the entire school! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 尾崎くんにはプライドがある
Ozaki-kun Has His Pride
Ozaki et sa fierté
오자키군에게는 프라이드가 있다
Ozaki-kun ni wa Pride ga Aru
episode.summary: Ozaki Atsumu is a mysterious loner who intently stares at things or people of interest. He is actually the author of the super hit manga "I will save this world!!"! He models his new character after Aoyama-kun and creates a villain "The Blue Wizard". To his surprise, he leaps to the top of the popularity chart! Despite his efforts to make the protagonist more popular, the Wizard keeps getting more popular. He tries everything to lower the popularity of the Wizard... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 塚本くんはウケが命
Tsukamoto-kun`s Life Is All About Laughs
Tsukamoto et le déconnage avant tout
츠카모토군은 개그가 생명
Tsukamoto-kun wa Uke ga Inochi
episode.summary: Tsukamoto Jin is the good vibrations officer of the Fujimi High School soccer club. He`s getting everybody fired up with his time-honored treasure, the butt lifts! However, as soon as the match starts, Four-Eyes is acting quite strangely. The captain of Minamida Fuzoku High School`s team, Kadomatsu, was Tsukamoto`s senpai at their middleschool. As he keeps targeting Four-Eyes repeatedly, Fujimi High School is under pressure. What happened between those two in middle school? What`s wrong, Tsukamoto? This is the time to fight! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 青山くんの選んだ理由
The Reason Behind Aoyama-kun`s Choice
Aoyama et son choix
아오야마군이 선택한 이유
Aoyama-kun no Eranda Riyuu
episode.summary: Today is the match against the high-ranking Kuraishi High School. In order to break through their ironclad defense, Zaizen`s performance as the forward need to be stellar! However, he is the one whose head doesn`t seem to be quite in the game. The reason being that Aoyama-kun is being actively scouted for the U16 team! On top of that, today is supposedly the day an important family member passed away. Aoyama-kun might quit the club! This might be the last match Fujimi High School`s soccer club plays with this team! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 坂井くんの髪型が変わった
Sakai-kun`s Hairstyle Has Changed
Sakai change de coupe de cheveux
사카이군의 헤어스타일이 변했다
Sakai-kun no Kamigata ga Kawatta
episode.summary: Sakai Kazuma is sort of the leader of the three stooges, and very average. Or he should have been, but all of the sudden he started to hear "The Whisper"! The desire to be attractive has awakened the goal hunter in the defender! Because of that, in danger of losing his position in the starting team, Zaizen decides to step up his game. Things are certainly more turbulent now at the Fujimi High School soccer club! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 青山くんは秘密が多い
Aoyama-kun Has Many Secrets
Aoyama a beaucoup de secrets
아오야마군은 비밀이 많아
Aoyama-kun wa Himitsu ga Ooi
episode.summary: Aoyama-kun`s private life is full of mysteries! In order to reveal some of those mysteries, the three stooges and Zaizen commit the rude act of tailing him. But when they finally arrive at his destination, it`s an old, traditional Japanese house, nothing like what they imagined. And for some reason, Ibuki Seigo is there, even though he`s supposed to be playing for a famous pro youth team in Spain! He is Aoyama-kun`s true rival! Does this mean trouble is brewing?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 美和ちゃんは合宿がしたい
Miwa-chan Wants to Do a Training Camp
Miwa veut organiser un stage
미와양은 합숙이 하고 싶어
Miwa-chan wa Gasshuku ga Shitai
episode.summary: As coach of the fujimi soccer club`s coach, Takei Miwa decides to take the club to their very first training camp! With the help of Zaizen Kaoru`s sister, Karin, who fully utilizes the Zaizen group`s resources, the training camp turns into something unimaginably big. Summer! Sea! Test of courage! ...wait, what about practice? A totally unique summer experience is about to begin. Source: crunchyroll
